srcField.title: Source Field
srcField.description: Field which contains the source FQDN to parse.

dstField.title: Destination Field
dstField.description: Field name where parsed FQDN components will be placed.

overwrite.title: Overwrite Existing Fields
overwrite.description: Overwrite existing event fields with extracted values. If set to No, existing field will be renamed as 'oldvalue'
